    • Uses of ClientModel in shared.utils

      Methods in shared.utils that return ClientModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientModel IServer.acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
      This method will send a response to the server for a trade offer given to the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buildCity(VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      This method will build a city for the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buildRoad(boolean free, EdgeLocation roadLocation)
      This method will build a road for the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buildSettlement(boolean free, VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      This method will build a settlement for the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buyDevCard()
      This method removes resource cards from player's in return for a development card.
      ClientModel IServer.discardCards(ResourceList discardedCards)
      This method will discard a set of cards from the client's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.finishTurn()
      This method will end the client's turn and start a new players turn.
      ClientModel IServer.getCurrentGame(int version)
      Prepares the version number to be sent to the server, then retrieves current game from the server if it's different than the current version.
      ClientModel IServer.maritimeTrade(int ratio, java.lang.String inputResource, java.lang.String outputResource)
      This method will complete trade with a maritime port.
      ClientModel IServer.offerTrade(ResourceList offer, int receiver)
      This method will offer a trade with another player.
      ClientModel IServer.playMonopolyCard(java.lang.String resource)
      This method plays a monopoly card from the player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playMonument()
      This method plays a monument card from the player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playRoadBuildingCard(EdgeLocation spot1, EdgeLocation spot2)
      This method will play a road building card from a player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playSoldierCard(HexLocation location, int victimIndex)
      This method will play a soldier card from a player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playYearOfPlentyCard(java.lang.String resource1, java.lang.String resource2)
      This method will play a year of plenty card from a player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.poll()
      This method will send a signal to the server checking to see if the current version of the model has been changed.
      ClientModel IServer.resetGame()
      This method resets the game within the server.
      ClientModel IServer.robPlayer(HexLocation location, int victimIndex)
      This method will move the robber and steal from a specific victim.
      ClientModel IServer.rollNumber(int number)
      This method will roll the dice for the client if current turn.
      ClientModel IServer.sendChat(java.lang.String content)
      This method sends a chat message to the server.
      ClientModel IServer.setCommands(CommandList commands)
      Prepares commands to be sent to the server, then sends them to server to apply to current game.

    • Uses of ClientModel in test

      Methods in test that return ClientModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientModel MockServer.acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
      Used to accept trades between player, should return a ClientModel that takes into account the newly accepted trade.
      ClientModel MockServer.buildCity(VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      Builds a city.
      ClientModel MockServer.buildRoad(boolean free, EdgeLocation roadLocation)
      Builds a new road.
      ClientModel MockServer.buildSettlement(boolean free, VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      Builds a settlement.
      ClientModel MockServer.buyDevCard()
      Player uses this to buy a development card.
      ClientModel MockServer.discardCards(ResourceList discardedCards)
      Discards a player's cards.
      ClientModel MockServer.finishTurn()
      This effectively ends a player's turn and makes it the next player's turn.
      ClientModel MockServer.getCurrentGame(int version)
      Gets the current Client Model associated with this game.
      ClientModel MockServer.maritimeTrade(int ratio, java.lang.String inputResource, java.lang.String outputResource)
      Player makes a trade with bank using specified resources.
      ClientModel MockServer.offerTrade(ResourceList offer, int receiver)
      Player uses this function to offer a trade to another player.
      ClientModel MockServer.playMonopolyCard(java.lang.String resource)
      Plays a monopoly card, steals a resources from other players.
      ClientModel MockServer.playMonument()
      Plays a monument card, which gives the player who played a victory point.
      ClientModel MockServer.playRoadBuildingCard(EdgeLocation spot1, EdgeLocation spot2)
      A player will place two roads on the map.
      ClientModel MockServer.playSoldierCard(HexLocation location, int victimIndex)
      Moves the robber to a new p;ace and possibly steals someone's resource card.
      ClientModel MockServer.playYearOfPlentyCard(java.lang.String resource1, java.lang.String resource2)
      Player plays a year of plenty card, gains two of a certain kind of resource.
      ClientModel MockServer.poll()
      Polls the server for an updated version of the model.
      ClientModel MockServer.resetGame()
      Sets the game back to starting state, which is a canned response (a different ClientModel that that given by getCurrentGame method).
      ClientModel MockServer.robPlayer(HexLocation location, int victimIndex)
      Player uses this to move robber and steal a card.
      ClientModel MockServer.rollNumber(int number)
      Apply actions given a specific rollNumber of number.
      ClientModel MockServer.sendChat(java.lang.String content)
      sends a chat message with player name added to the end, should return a ClientModel with the updated chat string.
      ClientModel MockServer.setCommands(CommandList commands)
      Executes commands inputed by parameter, should return a ClientModel that matches the inputed commands.
      Constructors in test with parameters of type ClientModel 
      Constructor and Description
      MockServer(ClientModel clientMockModel)
      Default constructor.
